lyrics.text: Baby girl you got me floating high
Never felt this way before tonight
Got me singing melodies so right
You're the reason I can touch the light
Met you at the party late that night
Something bout your energy felt right
Now we cruising through the city lights
Every moment with you feels so bright
Got me writing songs about your smile
Haven't felt this good in quite a while
Tell me that you'll stay here for a while
Girl you got me going extra wild
Yeah yeah yeah
You know what it is
When we together
Nothing else exists
Baby girl you got me floating high
Never felt this way before tonight
Got me singing melodies so right
You're the reason I can touch the light
La la la la
We go up up up
La la la la
Never coming down
